recipes.title: Vegetable Lasagna
recipes.instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. 2. In a large bowl, combine the olive oil, onion, garlic, parsley, and tomatoes. 3. Add the noodles and toss to coat evenly. 4. Bake for 20 minutes. 5. Serve with additional parsley and additional olive oil.

recipes.title: Chicken Parmesan
recipes.instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. 2. In a large bowl, combine the olive oil, onion, garlic, parsley, and tomatoes. 3. Add the noodles and toss to coat evenly. 4. Bake for 20 minutes. 5. Serve with additional parsley and additional olive oil.

recipes.title: Pizza
recipes.instructions: Combine ingredients for pizza dough. Leave to let the dough rise. Add toppings and bake for 20 minutes. Serve with additional parsley and additional olive oil.
